dcterms:creator: Yichen Jiang
Shikha Bordia
Zheng Zhong
Charles Dognin
Maneesh Singh
Mohit Bansal
dcterms:description: A dataset for multi-hop fact verification, which challenges models to extract relevant evidence from several Wikipedia articles and verify whether the claim is SUPPORTED or REFUTED by the evidence.
dcterms:title: HOVER

dcterms:creator: Andreas Vlachos
Christos Thorne
Christodoulopoulos
Arpit Mittal
dcterms:description: A large-scale fact verification dataset with the claims generated by altering sentences extracted from Wikipedia. The claims in FEVER are classified as SUPPORTS, REFUTES or NOT ENOUGH INFO (NEI) by annotators.
dcterms:title: FEVER

dcterms:creator: Rami Aly
Zhijiang Guo
Michael Schlichtkrull
James Thorne
Andreas Vlachos
Christos Christodoulopoulos
Oana Cocarascu
Arpit Mittal
dcterms:description: A large-scale multi-hop fact verification dataset consisting of claims verified against Wikipedia pages and labeled as SUPPORTS, REFUTES or NOT ENOUGH INFO (NEI).
dcterms:title: FEVEROUS

dcterms:creator: Wojciech Ostrowski
Arnav Arora
Pepa Atanasova
Isabelle Augenstein
dcterms:description: A multi-hop fact verification dataset of real-world claims with manual annotations of evidence from PolitiFact articles.
dcterms:title: PolitiHop

dcterms:creator: David Wadden
Shanchuan Lin
Kyle Lo
Lucy Lu Wang
Madeleine van Zuylen
Arman Cohan
Hannaneh Hajishirzi
dcterms:description: A scientific fact verification dataset of expert-written scientific claims paired with evidence.
dcterms:title: SCIFACT

dcterms:creator: Mourad Sarrouti
Asma Ben Abacha
Yassine Mrabet
Dina Demner-Fushman
dcterms:description: An evidence-based fact verification dataset for health-related claims, where the relations between each piece of evidence and the associated claim are manually annotated as SUPPORT, REFUTE, and NEUTRAL.
dcterms:title: HealthVer

dcterms:creator: Neema Kotonya
Francesca Toni
dcterms:description: A 4-way classification dataset for explainable fact verification with gold standard explanations by journalists in the public health setting.
dcterms:title: PubHealth

dcterms:creator: Julian Eisenschlos
Bhuwan Dhingra
Jannis Bulian
Benjamin BÃ¶rschinger
Jordan Boyd-Graber
dcterms:description: A large-scale dataset of challenging claim-evidence pairs collected through a fun multi-player game which encourages adversarial instances.
dcterms:title: FM2

dcterms:creator: Tal Schuster
Adam Fisch
Regina Barzilay
dcterms:description: A large-scale contrastive fact verification dataset, where each contrastive claim is manually written by annotators based on Wikipedia revisions.
dcterms:title: VITAMINC
